20101222230418.000|20101222230421.000|TR0|ADVISER:  We remain vigilant to attempts 
20101222230421.000|20101222230423.000|TR0|by Al Qaeda and other terrorist 
20101222230423.000|20101222230425.000|TR0|organizations to carry out cowardly 
20101222230425.000|20101222230427.000|TR0|attacks against innocent men, women, and 
20101222230427.000|20101222230429.000|TR0|children, and we are working very closely 
20101222230429.000|20101222230431.000|TR0|with other governments to share all threat 
20101222230431.000|20101222230434.000|TR0|information immediately and to coordinate 
20101222230434.000|20101222230436.000|TR0|closely our counterterrorism and security 
20101222230436.000|20101222230438.000|TR0|activities.
20101222230438.000|20101222230440.000|TR0|
20101222230440.000|20101222230442.000|TR0|I think the enhancements we have made to 
20101222230442.000|20101222230444.000|TR0|our security over the past decade have 
20101222230444.000|20101222230446.000|TR0|made it much more difficult for terrorists 
20101222230446.000|20101222230449.000|TR0|to conduct these large-scale attacks.  We 
20101222230449.000|20101222230451.000|TR0|have degraded their capabilities, we have 
20101222230451.000|20101222230453.000|TR0|degraded their training capabilities and 
20101222230453.000|20101222230455.000|TR0|ability to plot and to move operatives.
20101222230455.000|20101222230457.000|TR0|
20101222230457.000|20101222230459.000|TR0|So what we have seen recently is increased 
20101222230459.000|20101222230502.000|TR0|focus, I think, on the part of terrorist 
20101222230502.000|20101222230504.000|TR0|groups to try to carry out some of the 
20101222230504.000|20101222230506.000|TR0|smaller scale attacks.  And so we are 
20101222230506.000|20101222230508.000|TR0|staying very focused on our ability to 
20101222230508.000|20101222230510.000|TR0|detect those types of attacks and stop 
20101222230510.000|20101222230512.000|TR0|them, whether or not they are by 
20101222230512.000|20101222230514.000|TR0|individuals or they are part of a larger

20101222232954.000|20101222232956.000|TR0|
20101222232956.000|20101222232958.000|TR0|DAN LOTHIAN, CNN WHITE HOUSE

20101222234003.000|20101222234006.000|TR0|there were gay soldiers who fought for 
20101222234006.000|20101222234008.000|TR0|American independence, who consecrated the 
20101222234008.000|20101222234010.000|TR0|ground at Gettysburg, who manned the 
20101222234010.000|20101222234012.000|TR0|trenches along the western front, who 
20101222234012.000|20101222234014.000|TR0|stormed the beaches of Iwo Jima. Their 
20101222234014.000|20101222234016.000|TR0|names are etched into the walls of our 
20101222234016.000|20101222234018.000|TR0|memorials.  Their headstones dot the 
20101222234018.000|20101222234021.000|TR0|grounds at Arlington.
20101222234021.000|20101222234023.000|TR0|
20101222234023.000|20101222234025.000|TR0|And so, as the first generation to serve 
20101222234025.000|20101222234027.000|TR0|openly in our armed forces, you will stand 
20101222234027.000|20101222234029.000|TR0|for all those who came before you, and you 
20101222234029.000|20101222234031.000|TR0|will serve as role models to all who come 
20101222234031.000|20101222234034.000|TR0|after you.  And I know that you will 
20101222234034.000|20101222234036.000|TR0|fulfill this responsibility with integrity 
20101222234036.000|20101222234038.000|TR0|and honor, just as you have every other 
20101222234038.000|20101222234040.000|TR0|mission with which you've been charged.
20101222234040.000|20101222234042.000|TR0|
20101222234042.000|20101222234044.000|TR0|(END VIDEO CLIP)
20101222234044.000|20101222234046.000|TR0|
20101222234046.000|20101222234049.000|TR0|BLITZER:  The new policy was a long time 
20101222234049.000|20101222234051.000|TR0|coming for so many gay military veterans.  
20101222234051.000|20101222234053.000|TR0|Our White House correspondent, Ed Henry, 
20101222234053.000|20101222234055.000|TR0|spoke to some of them.  He's in Honolulu

20101222234149.000|20101222234151.000|TR0|serving, and Jeff, who was in the Air
